short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add items from any webpage to your Wishlistr.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The official Wishlistr button for Chrome is the easiest way to add items to your wishlist from any webpage â€“ just click the Wishlistr button next time you find something that you want. 

About Wishlistr:
Wishlistr is an easy to use web-based application that will help you collect, organize and keep track of the things you want. Don't have an account yet? Create your free account on http://wishlistr.com.
